 1989: thread_mseg_alloc_cache_clean_test(_Port, 0, _CCI, _Size) ->
 1990:     ok;
 1991: thread_mseg_alloc_cache_clean_test(Port, N, CCI, Size) ->
 1992:     wait_until(fun () -> 0 == mseg_alloc_cached_segments() end),
 1993:     receive after CCI+500 -> ok end,
 1994:     OCCC = mseg_alloc_ccc(),
 1995:     "ok" = erlang:port_control(Port, 0, integer_to_list(Size)),
 1996:     receive after CCI+500 -> ok end,
 1997:     CCC = mseg_alloc_ccc(),
 1998:     io:format("CCC = ~p~n", [CCC]),
 1999:     true = CCC > OCCC,
 2000:     thread_mseg_alloc_cache_clean_test(Port, N-1, CCI, Size).
 2001: 
 2002: otp_9302(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2003:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2004:     erl_ddll:start(),
 2005:     ok = load_driver(Path, otp_9302_drv),
 2006:     Port = open_port({spawn, otp_9302_drv}, []),
 2007:     true = is_port(Port),
 2008:     port_command(Port, ""),
 2009:     {msg, block} = get_port_msg(Port, infinity),
 2010:     {msg, job} = get_port_msg(Port, infinity),
 2011:     C = case erlang:system_info(thread_pool_size) of
 2012:             0 ->
 2013:                 {msg, cancel} = get_port_msg(Port, infinity),
 2014:                 {msg, job} = get_port_msg(Port, infinity),
 2015:                 false;
 2016:             _ ->
 2017:                 case get_port_msg(Port, infinity) of
 2018:                     {msg, cancel} -> %% Cancel always fail in Rel >= 15
 2019:                         {msg, job} = get_port_msg(Port, infinity),
 2020:                         false;
 2021:                     {msg, job} ->
 2022:                         ok,
 2023:                         true
 2024:                 end
 2025:         end,
 2026:     {msg, end_of_jobs} = get_port_msg(Port, infinity),
 2027:     no_msg = get_port_msg(Port, 2000),
 2028:     port_close(Port),
 2029:     case C of
 2030:         true ->
 2031:             {comment, "Async job cancelled"};
 2032:         false ->
 2033:             {comment, "Async job not cancelled"}
 2034:     end.
 2035: 
 2036: thr_free_drv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2037:     case erlang:system_info(threads) of
 2038:         false ->
 2039:             {skipped, "No thread support"};
 2040:         true ->
 2041:             thr_free_drv_do(Config)
 2042:     end.
 2043: 
 2044: thr_free_drv_do(Config) ->
 2045:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2046:     erl_ddll:start(),
 2047:     ok = load_driver(Path, thr_free_drv),
 2048:     MemBefore = driver_alloc_size(),
 2049:     %    io:format("SID=~p", [erlang:system_info(scheduler_id)]),
 2050:     Port = open_port({spawn, thr_free_drv}, []),
 2051:     MemPeek = driver_alloc_size(),
 2052:     true = is_port(Port),
 2053:     ok = thr_free_drv_control(Port, 0),
 2054:     port_close(Port),
 2055:     MemAfter = driver_alloc_size(),
 2056:     io:format("MemPeek=~p~n", [MemPeek]),
 2057:     io:format("MemBefore=~p, MemAfter=~p~n", [MemBefore, MemAfter]),
 2058:     MemBefore = MemAfter,
 2059:     case MemPeek of
 2060:         undefined -> ok;
 2061:         _ ->
 2062:             true = MemPeek > MemBefore
 2063:     end,
 2064:     ok.
 2065: 
 2066: thr_free_drv_control(Port, N) ->
 2067:     case erlang:port_control(Port, 0, "") of
 2068:         "done" ->
 2069:             ok;
 2070:         "more" ->
 2071:             erlang:yield(),
 2072:             %	    io:format("N=~p, SID=~p", [N, erlang:system_info(scheduler_id)]),
 2073:             thr_free_drv_control(Port, N+1)
 2074:     end.
 2075: 
 2076: async_blast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2077:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2078:     erl_ddll:start(),
 2079:     ok = load_driver(Path, async_blast_drv),
 2080:     SchedOnln = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 2081:     MemBefore = driver_alloc_size(),
 2082:     Start = os:timestamp(),
 2083:     Blast = fun () ->
 2084:                     Port = open_port({spawn, async_blast_drv}, []),
 2085:                     true = is_port(Port),
 2086:                     port_command(Port, ""),
 2087:                     receive
 2088:                         {Port, done} ->
 2089:                             ok
 2090:                     end,
 2091:                     port_close(Port)
 2092:             end,
 2093:     Ps = lists:map(fun (N) ->
 2094:                            spawn_opt(Blast,
 2095:                                      [{scheduler,
 2096:                                        (N rem SchedOnln)+ 1},
 2097:                                       monitor])
 2098:                    end,
 2099:                    lists:seq(1, 100)),
 2100:     MemMid = driver_alloc_size(),
 2101:     lists:foreach(fun ({Pid, Mon}) ->
 2102:                           receive
 2103:                               {'DOWN',Mon,process,Pid,_} -> ok
 2104:                           end
 2105:                   end, Ps),
 2106:     End = os:timestamp(),
 2107:     MemAfter = driver_alloc_size(),
 2108:     ct:log("MemBefore=~p, MemMid=~p, MemAfter=~p~n",
 2109:               [MemBefore, MemMid, MemAfter]),
 2110:     AsyncBlastTime = timer:now_diff(End,Start)/1000000,
 2111:     ct:log("AsyncBlastTime=~p~n", [AsyncBlastTime]),
 2112:     MemBefore = MemAfter,
 2113:     ok.
 2114: 
 2115: thr_msg_blast_receiver(_Port, N, N) ->
 2116:     ok;
 2117: thr_msg_blast_receiver(Port, N, Max) ->
 2118:     receive
 2119:         {Port, hi} ->
 2120:             thr_msg_blast_receiver(Port, N+1, Max)
 2121:     end.
 2122: 
 2123: thr_msg_blast_receiver_proc(Port, Max, Parent, Done) ->
 2124:     case port_control(Port, 0, "") of
 2125:         "receiver" ->
 2126:             spawn(fun () ->
 2127:                           thr_msg_blast_receiver_proc(Port, Max+1, Parent, Done)
 2128:                   end),
 2129:             thr_msg_blast_receiver(Port, 0, Max);
 2130:         "done" ->
 2131:             Parent ! Done
 2132:     end.
 2133: 
 2134: thr_msg_blast() ->
 2135:     [{timetrap, {minutes, 10}}].
 2136: 
 2137: thr_msg_blast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2138:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2139:     erl_ddll:start(),
 2140:     ok = load_driver(Path, thr_msg_blast_drv),
 2141:     MemBefore = driver_alloc_size(),
 2142:     Start = os:timestamp(),
 2143:     Port = open_port({spawn, thr_msg_blast_drv}, []),
 2144:     true = is_port(Port),
 2145:     Done = make_ref(),
 2146:     Me = self(),
 2147:     spawn(fun () ->
 2148:                   thr_msg_blast_receiver_proc(Port, 1, Me, Done)
 2149:           end),
 2150:     receive
 2151:         Done -> ok
 2152:     end,
 2153:     ok = thr_msg_blast_receiver(Port, 0, 32*10000),
 2154:     port_close(Port),
 2155:     End = os:timestamp(),
 2156:     receive
 2157:         Garbage ->
 2158:             ct:fail({received_garbage, Port, Garbage})
 2159:     after 2000 ->
 2160:             ok
 2161:     end,
 2162:     MemAfter = driver_alloc_size(),
 2163:     ct:log("MemBefore=~p, MemAfter=~p~n",
 2164:               [MemBefore, MemAfter]),
 2165:     ThrMsgBlastTime = timer:now_diff(End,Start)/1000000,
 2166:     ct:log("ThrMsgBlastTime=~p~n", [ThrMsgBlastTime]),
 2167:     MemBefore = MemAfter,
 2168:     Res = {thr_msg_blast_time, ThrMsgBlastTime},
 2169:     Res.
 2170: 
 2171: -define(IN_RANGE(LoW_, VaLuE_, HiGh_),
 2172:         case in_range(LoW_, VaLuE_, HiGh_) of
 2173:             true -> ok;
 2174:             false ->
 2175:                 case erlang:system_info(lock_checking) of
 2176:                     true ->
 2177:                         io:format("~p:~p: Ignore bad sched count due to "
 2178:                                   "lock checking~n",
 2179:                                   [?MODULE,?LINE]);
 2180:                     false ->
 2181:                         ct:fail({unexpected_sched_counts, VaLuE_})
 2182:                 end
 2183:         end).
 2184: 
 2185: 
 2186: consume_timeslice(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2187:     %%
 2188:     %% Verify that erl_drv_consume_timeslice() works.
 2189:     %%
 2190:     %% The first four cases expect that the command signal is
 2191:     %% delivered immediately, i.e., isn't scheduled. Since there
 2192:     %% are no conflicts these signals should normally be delivered
 2193:     %% immediately. However some builds and configurations may
 2194:     %% schedule these ops anyway, in these cases we do not verify
 2195:     %% scheduling counts.
 2196:     %%
 2197:     %% When signal is delivered immediately we must take into account
 2198:     %% that process and port are "virtually" scheduled out and in
 2199:     %% in the trace generated.
 2200:     %%
 2201:     %% Port ! {_, {command, _}, and port_command() differs. The send
 2202:     %% instruction needs to check if the caller is out of reductions
 2203:     %% at the end of the instruction, since no erlang function call
 2204:     %% is involved. Otherwise, a sequence of send instructions would
 2205:     %% not be scheduled out even when out of reductions. port_commond()
 2206:     %% doesn't do that since it will always (since R16A) be called via
 2207:     %% the erlang wrappers in the erlang module.
 2208:     %%
 2209:     %% The last two cases tests scheduled operations. We create
 2210:     %% a conflict by executing at the same time on different
 2211:     %% schedulers. When only one scheduler we enable parallelism on
 2212:     %% the port instead.
 2213:     %%
 2214: 
 2215:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2216:     erl_ddll:start(),
 2217:     ok = load_driver(Path, consume_timeslice_drv),
 2218:     Port = open_port({spawn, consume_timeslice_drv}, [{parallelism, false}]),
 2219: 
 2220:     Parent = self(),
 2221:     Go = make_ref(),
 2222: 
 2223:     "enabled" = port_control(Port, $E, ""),
 2224:     Proc1 = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2225:                                receive Go -> ok end,
 2226:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2227:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2228:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2229:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2230:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2231:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2232:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2233:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2234:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2235:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}}
 2236:                        end),
 2237:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2238:     count_pp_sched_start(),
 2239:     Proc1 ! Go,
 2240:     wait_command_msgs(Port, 10),
 2241:     [{Port, Sprt1}, {Proc1, Sproc1}] = count_pp_sched_stop([Port, Proc1]),
 2242:     ?IN_RANGE(10, Sprt1, 10),
 2243:     ?IN_RANGE(5, Sproc1-10, 7),
 2244: 
 2245:     "disabled" = port_control(Port, $D, ""),
 2246:     Proc2 = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2247:                                receive Go -> ok end,
 2248:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2249:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2250:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2251:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2252:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2253:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2254:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2255:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2256:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2257:                                Port ! {Parent, {command, ""}}
 2258:                        end),
 2259:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2260:     count_pp_sched_start(),
 2261:     Proc2 ! Go,
 2262:     wait_command_msgs(Port, 10),
 2263:     [{Port, Sprt2}, {Proc2, Sproc2}] = count_pp_sched_stop([Port, Proc2]),
 2264:     ?IN_RANGE(10, Sprt2, 10),
 2265:     ?IN_RANGE(1, Sproc2-10, 2),
 2266: 
 2267:     "enabled" = port_control(Port, $E, ""),
 2268:     Proc3 = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2269:                                receive Go -> ok end,
 2270:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2271:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2272:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2273:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2274:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2275:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2276:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2277:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2278:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2279:                                port_command(Port, "")
 2280:                        end),
 2281:     count_pp_sched_start(),
 2282:     Proc3 ! Go,
 2283:     wait_command_msgs(Port, 10),
 2284:     [{Port, Sprt3}, {Proc3, Sproc3}] = count_pp_sched_stop([Port, Proc3]),
 2285:     ?IN_RANGE(10, Sprt3, 10),
 2286:     ?IN_RANGE(5, Sproc3-10, 7),
 2287: 
 2288:     "disabled" = port_control(Port, $D, ""),
 2289:     Proc4 = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2290:                                receive Go -> ok end,
 2291:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2292:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2293:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2294:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2295:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2296:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2297:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2298:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2299:                                port_command(Port, ""),
 2300:                                port_command(Port, "")
 2301:                        end),
 2302:     count_pp_sched_start(),
 2303:     Proc4 ! Go,
 2304:     wait_command_msgs(Port, 10),
 2305:     [{Port, Sprt4}, {Proc4, Sproc4}] = count_pp_sched_stop([Port, Proc4]),
 2306:     ?IN_RANGE(10, Sprt4, 10),
 2307:     ?IN_RANGE(1, Sproc4-10, 2),
 2308: 
 2309:     SOnl = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 2310:     %% If only one scheduler use port with parallelism set to true,
 2311:     %% in order to trigger scheduling of command signals
 2312:     Port2 = case SOnl of
 2313:                 1 ->
 2314:                     Port ! {self(), close},
 2315:                     receive {Port, closed} -> ok end,
 2316:                     open_port({spawn, consume_timeslice_drv},
 2317:                               [{parallelism, true}]);
 2318:                 _ ->
 2319:                     process_flag(scheduler, 1),
 2320:                     1 = erlang:system_info(scheduler_id),
 2321:                     Port
 2322:             end,
 2323:     count_pp_sched_start(),
 2324:     "enabled" = port_control(Port2, $E, ""),
 2325:     W5 = case SOnl of
 2326:              1 ->
 2327:                  false;
 2328:              _ ->
 2329:                  W1= spawn_opt(fun () ->
 2330:                                        2 = erlang:system_info(scheduler_id),
 2331:                                        "sleeped" = port_control(Port2, $S, "")
 2332:                                end, [link,{scheduler,2}]),
 2333:                  receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2334:                  W1
 2335:          end,
 2336:     Proc5 = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 2337:                               receive Go -> ok end,
 2338:                               1 = erlang:system_info(scheduler_id),
 2339:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2340:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2341:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2342:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2343:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2344:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2345:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2346:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2347:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2348:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}}
 2349:                       end, [link,{scheduler,1}]),
 2350:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2351:     Proc5 ! Go,
 2352:     wait_procs_exit([W5, Proc5]),
 2353:     wait_command_msgs(Port2, 10),
 2354:     [{Port2, Sprt5}, {Proc5, Sproc5}] = count_pp_sched_stop([Port2, Proc5]),
 2355:     ?IN_RANGE(2, Sproc5, 3),
 2356:     ?IN_RANGE(6, Sprt5, 20),
 2357: 
 2358:     count_pp_sched_start(),
 2359:     "disabled" = port_control(Port2, $D, ""),
 2360:     W6 = case SOnl of
 2361:              1 ->
 2362:                  false;
 2363:              _ ->
 2364:                  W2= spawn_opt(fun () ->
 2365:                                        2 = erlang:system_info(scheduler_id),
 2366:                                        "sleeped" = port_control(Port2, $S, "")
 2367:                                end, [link,{scheduler,2}]),
 2368:                  receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2369:                  W2
 2370:          end,
 2371:     Proc6 = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 2372:                               receive Go -> ok end,
 2373:                               1 = erlang:system_info(scheduler_id),
 2374:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2375:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2376:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2377:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2378:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2379:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2380:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2381:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2382:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}},
 2383:                               Port2 ! {Parent, {command, ""}}
 2384:                       end, [link,{scheduler,1}]),
 2385:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2386:     Proc6 ! Go,
 2387:     wait_procs_exit([W6, Proc6]),
 2388:     wait_command_msgs(Port2, 10),
 2389:     [{Port2, Sprt6}, {Proc6, Sproc6}] = count_pp_sched_stop([Port2, Proc6]),
 2390:     ?IN_RANGE(2, Sproc6, 3),
 2391:     ?IN_RANGE(2, Sprt6, 6),
 2392: 
 2393:     process_flag(scheduler, 0),
 2394: 
 2395:     Port2 ! {self(), close},
 2396:     receive {Port2, closed} -> ok end,
 2397:     ok.
 2398: 
 2399: 
 2400: wait_command_msgs(_, 0) ->
 2401:     ok;
 2402: wait_command_msgs(Port, N) ->
 2403:     receive
 2404:         {Port, command} ->
 2405:             wait_command_msgs(Port, N-1)
 2406:     end.
 2407: 
 2408: in_range(Low, Val, High) when is_integer(Low),
 2409:                               is_integer(Val),
 2410:                               is_integer(High),
 2411:                               Low =< Val,
 2412:                               Val =< High ->
 2413:     true;
 2414: in_range(Low, Val, High) when is_integer(Low),
 2415:                               is_integer(Val),
 2416:                               is_integer(High) ->
 2417:     false.
 2418: 
 2419: count_pp_sched_start() ->
 2420:     erlang:trace(all, true, [running_procs, running_ports, {tracer, self()}]),
 2421:     ok.
 2422: 
 2423: count_pp_sched_stop(Ps) ->
 2424:     Td = erlang:trace_delivered(all),
 2425:     erlang:trace(all, false, [running_procs, running_ports, {tracer, self()}]),
 2426:     PNs = lists:map(fun (P) -> {P, 0} end, Ps),
 2427:     receive {trace_delivered, all, Td} -> ok end,
 2428:     Res = count_proc_sched(Ps, PNs),
 2429:     ct:log("Scheduling counts: ~p~n", [Res]),
 2430:     Res.
 2431: 
 2432: do_inc_pn(_P, []) ->
 2433:     throw(undefined);
 2434: do_inc_pn(P, [{P,N}|PNs]) ->
 2435:     [{P,N+1}|PNs];
 2436: do_inc_pn(P, [PN|PNs]) ->
 2437:     [PN|do_inc_pn(P, PNs)].
 2438: 
 2439: inc_pn(P, PNs) ->
 2440:     try
 2441:         do_inc_pn(P, PNs)
 2442:     catch
 2443:         throw:undefined -> PNs
 2444:     end.
 2445: 
 2446: count_proc_sched(Ps, PNs) ->
 2447:     receive
 2448:         TT when element(1, TT) == trace, element(3, TT) == in ->
 2449:             %	    erlang:display(TT),
 2450:             count_proc_sched(Ps, inc_pn(element(2, TT), PNs));
 2451:         TT when element(1, TT) == trace, element(3, TT) == out ->
 2452:             count_proc_sched(Ps, PNs)
 2453:     after 0 ->
 2454:               PNs
 2455:     end.
 2456: 
 2457: %%
 2458: %% Tests whether erl_drv_putenv reflects in os:getenv and vice versa.
 2459: %%
 2460: env(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2461:     ok = load_driver(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), env_drv),
 2462:     Port = open_port({spawn_driver, env_drv}, []),
 2463:     true = is_port(Port),
 2464: 
 2465:     Keys = ["env_drv_a_key", "env_drv_b_key", "env_drv_c_key"],
 2466:     Values = ["a_value", "b_value", "c_value"],
 2467: 
 2468:     [env_put_test(Port, Key, Value) || Key <- Keys, Value <- Values],
 2469:     [env_get_test(Port, Key, Value) || Key <- Keys, Value <- Values],
 2470:     [env_oversize_test(Port, Key) || Key <- Keys],
 2471:     [env_notfound_test(Port, Key) || Key <- Keys],
 2472: 
 2473:     true = port_close(Port),
 2474:     erl_ddll:unload_driver(env_drv),
 2475:     ok.
 2476: 
 2477: env_control(Port, Command, Key, Value) ->
 2478:     KeyBin = list_to_binary(Key),
 2479:     ValueBin = list_to_binary(Value),
 2480:     Header = <<(byte_size(KeyBin)), (byte_size(ValueBin))>>,
 2481:     Payload = <<KeyBin/binary, ValueBin/binary>>,
 2482:     port_control(Port, Command, <<Header/binary, Payload/binary>>).
 2483: 
 2484: env_put_test(Port, Key, Value) ->
 2485:     os:unsetenv(Key),
 2486:     [0] = env_control(Port, 0, Key, Value),
 2487:     Value = os:getenv(Key).
 2488: 
 2489: env_get_test(Port, Key, ExpectedValue) ->
 2490:     true = os:putenv(Key, ExpectedValue),
 2491:     [0] = env_control(Port, 1, Key, ExpectedValue).
 2492: 
 2493: env_oversize_test(Port, Key) ->
 2494:     os:putenv(Key, [$A || _ <- lists:seq(1, 1024)]),
 2495:     [127] = env_control(Port, 1, Key, "").
 2496: 
 2497: env_notfound_test(Port, Key) ->
 2498:     true = os:unsetenv(Key),
 2499:     [255] = env_control(Port, 1, Key, "").
 2500: 
 2501: 
 2502: a_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2503:     rpc(Config, fun check_io_debug/0).
 2504: 
 2505: z_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2506:     rpc(Config, fun check_io_debug/0).
 2507: 
 2508: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2509: %% 		Utilities
 2510: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2511: 
 2512: check_io_debug() ->
 2513:     get_stable_check_io_info(),
 2514:     {NoErrorFds, NoUsedFds, NoDrvSelStructs, NoEnifSelStructs}
 2515:         = CheckIoDebug = erts_debug:get_internal_state(check_io_debug),
 2516:     HasGetHost = has_gethost(),
 2517:     ct:log("check_io_debug: ~p~n"
 2518:            "HasGetHost: ~p",[CheckIoDebug, HasGetHost]),
 2519:     0 = NoErrorFds,
 2520:     if
 2521:         NoUsedFds == NoDrvSelStructs ->
 2522:             ok;
 2523:         HasGetHost andalso (NoUsedFds == (NoDrvSelStructs - 1)) ->
 2524:             %% If the inet_gethost port is alive, we may have
 2525:             %% one extra used fd that is not selected on
 2526:             ok
 2527:     end,
 2528:     0 = NoEnifSelStructs,
 2529:     ok.
 2530: 
 2531: has_gethost() ->
 2532:     has_gethost(erlang:ports()).
 2533: has_gethost([P|T]) ->
 2534:     {name, Name} = erlang:port_info(P, name),
 2535:     case filename:basename(Name) of
 2536:         "inet_gethost"++_ ->
 2537:             true;
 2538:         _ ->
 2539:             has_gethost(T)
 2540:     end;
 2541: has_gethost([]) ->
 2542:     false.
 2543: 
 2544: %flush_msgs() ->
 2545: %    receive
 2546: %	M ->
 2547: %	    erlang:display(M),
 2548: %	    flush_msgs()
 2549: %    after 0 ->
 2550: %	    ok
 2551: %    end.
 2552: 
 2553: wait_procs_exit([]) ->
 2554:     ok;
 2555: wait_procs_exit([P|Ps]) when is_pid(P) ->
 2556:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, P),
 2557:     receive
 2558:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, P, _} ->
 2559:             wait_procs_exit(Ps)
 2560:     end;
 2561: wait_procs_exit([_|Ps]) ->
 2562:     wait_procs_exit(Ps).
 2563: 
 2564: get_port_msg(Port, Timeout) ->
 2565:     receive
 2566:         {Port, What} ->
 2567:             {msg, What}
 2568:     after Timeout ->
 2569:               no_msg
 2570:     end.
 2571: 
 2572: wait_until(Fun) ->
 2573:     case Fun() of
 2574:         true -> ok;
 2575:         false ->
 2576:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2577:             wait_until(Fun)
 2578:     end.
 2579: 
 2580: drv_vsn_str2tup(Str) ->
 2581:     [Major, Minor] = string:lexemes(Str, "."),
 2582:     {list_to_integer(Major), list_to_integer(Minor)}.
 2583: 
 2584: %% Build port data from a template.
 2585: 
 2586: build_data({bin,Size})  -> build_binary(Size);
 2587: build_data({list,Size}) -> build_list(Size);
 2588: build_data(int) -> random_char();
 2589: build_data([])  -> [];
 2590: build_data([H|T]) -> [build_data(H)|build_data(T)].
 2591: 
 2592: %% Transform all binaries in a term.
 2593: 
 2594: transform_bins(_Transform, []) -> [];
 2595: transform_bins(Transform, [H|T]) ->
 2596:     [transform_bins(Transform, H)|transform_bins(Transform, T)];
 2597: transform_bins(Transform, Tuple) when is_tuple(Tuple) ->
 2598:     list_to_tuple([transform_bins(Transform, E) || E <- tuple_to_list(Tuple)]);
 2599: transform_bins(Transform, Bin) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 2600:     Transform(Bin);
 2601: transform_bins(_Transform, Other) -> Other.
 2602: 
 2603: 
 2604: %% Convert all binaries in a term to sub binaries.
 2605: 
 2606: make_sub_binaries(Term) ->
 2607:     MakeSub = fun(Bin0) ->
 2608:                       Bin1 = <<243:8,0:3,Bin0/binary,31:5,19:8>>,
 2609:                       Sz = size(Bin0),
 2610:                       <<243:8,0:3,Bin:Sz/binary,31:5,19:8>> = id(Bin1),
 2611:                       Bin
 2612:               end,
 2613:     transform_bins(MakeSub, Term).
 2614: 
 2615: id(I) -> I.
 2616: 
 2617: %% Convert all binaries in a term to refc binaries.
 2618: 
 2619: make_refc_binaries(Term) ->
 2620:     F = fun(B0) -> list_to_binary([build_binary(?heap_binary_size+1),B0]) end,
 2621:     transform_bins(F, Term).
 2622: 
 2623: build_binary(Elements) ->
 2624:     rand:bytes(Elements).
 2625: 
 2626: build_list(Elements) -> build_list(Elements, []).
 2627: 
 2628: build_list(0, Acc) -> Acc;
 2629: build_list(Elements, Acc) -> build_list(Elements-1, [random_char()|Acc]).
 2630: 
 2631: 
 2632: %% Convert all binaries in a list to writable binaries.
 2633: 
 2634: make_writable_binaries(Term) ->
 2635:     transform_bins(fun(Bin) -> <<Bin/binary,1,2,3>> end, Term).
 2636: 
 2637: append_to_writable_binaries(Term) ->
 2638:     transform_bins(fun(Bin) -> <<Bin/binary,0:(64*1024*8)>> end, Term).
 2639: 
 2640: random_char() ->
 2641:     uniform(256) - 1.
 2642: 
 2643: uniform(N) ->
 2644:     rand:uniform(N).
 2645: 
 2646: erl_millisecs() ->
 2647:     erl_millisecs(erlang:monotonic_time()).
 2648: 
 2649: erl_millisecs(MonotonicTime) ->
 2650:     (1000*MonotonicTime)/erlang:convert_time_unit(1,second,native).
 2651: 
 2652: %% Start/stop drivers.
 2653: start_driver(Config, Name, Binary) ->
 2654:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2655:     erl_ddll:start(),
 2656: 
 2657:     %% Load the driver
 2658:     ok = load_driver(Path, Name),
 2659: 
 2660:     %% open port.
 2661:     case Binary of
 2662:         true ->
 2663:             open_port({spawn, Name}, [binary]);
 2664:         false ->
 2665:             open_port({spawn, Name}, [])
 2666:     end.
 2667: 
 2668: stop_driver(Port, Name) ->
 2669:     true = erlang:port_close(Port),
 2670:     receive
 2671:         {Port,Message} ->
 2672:             ct:fail({strange_message_from_port,Message})
 2673:     after 0 ->
 2674:               ok
 2675:     end,
 2676: 
 2677:     %% Unload the driver.
 2678:     ok = erl_ddll:unload_driver(Name),
 2679:     ok = erl_ddll:stop().
 2680: 
 2681: load_driver(Dir, Driver) ->
 2682:     Before = erlang:system_info(taints),
 2683:     case erl_ddll:load_driver(Dir, Driver) of
 2684:         ok ->
 2685:             After = erlang:system_info(taints),
 2686:             case lists:member(Driver, Before) of
 2687:                 true ->
 2688:                     After = Before;
 2689:                 false ->
 2690:                     true = lists:member(Driver, After),
 2691:                     Before = lists:delete(Driver, After)
 2692:             end,
 2693:             ok;
 2694:         {error, Error} = Res ->
 2695:             io:format("~s\n", [erl_ddll:format_error(Error)]),
 2696:             Res
 2697:     end.
 2698: 
 2699: sleep() ->
 2700:     receive after infinity -> ok end.
 2701: 
 2702: sleep(infinity) ->
 2703:     sleep();
 2704: sleep(Ms) when is_integer(Ms), Ms >= 0 ->
 2705:     receive after Ms -> ok end.
 2706: 
 2707: 
 2708: setup_logger(Node) ->
 2709:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2710:     Name = hd(string:lexemes(atom_to_list(Node), "@")),
 2711:     LogPath = filename:join(Pwd, "error_log." ++ Name),
 2712:     ct:pal("Logging to: ~s", [LogPath]),
 2713:     rpc:call(Node, logger, add_handler, [file_handler, logger_std_h,
 2714:                                          #{formatter => {logger_formatter,#{ single_line => false }},
 2715:                                            config => #{file => LogPath }}]).
 2716: 
 2717: wait_deallocations() ->
 2718:     try
 2719:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, deallocations)
 2720:     catch error:undef ->
 2721:               erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2722:               wait_deallocations()
 2723:     end.
 2724: 
 2725: driver_alloc_size() ->
 2726:     wait_deallocations(),
 2727:     erts_debug:alloc_blocks_size(driver_alloc).
 2728: 
 2729: rpc(Config, Fun) ->
 2730:     case proplists:get_value(node, Config) of
 2731:         undefined ->
 2732:             Fun();
 2733:         {_Peer, Node} ->
 2734:             ct:log("Running RPC ~p on ~p/~p~n", [Fun, _Peer, Node]),
 2735:             Self = self(),
 2736:             Ref = make_ref(),
 2737:             Pid = spawn(Node,
 2738:                         fun() ->
 2739:                                 Result
 2740:                                     = try Fun() of
 2741:                                           Res -> Res
 2742:                                       catch E:R:Stk ->
 2743:                                               {'EXIT',E,R,Stk}
 2744:                                       end,
 2745:                                 Self ! {Ref, Result}
 2746:                         end),
 2747:             MRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 2748:             receive
 2749:                 {'DOWN', MRef, _Type, _Object, Info} ->
 2750:                     erlang:error({died, Pid, Info});
 2751:                 {Ref, {'EXIT',E,R,ST}} ->
 2752:                     erlang:demonitor(MRef, [flush]),
 2753:                     erlang:raise(E,R,ST);
 2754:                 {Ref, Ret} ->
 2755:                     erlang:demonitor(MRef, [flush]),
 2756:                     Ret;
 2757:                 Other ->
 2758:                     ct:fail(Other)
 2759:             end
 2760:     end.
 2761: 
 2762: poll_pipe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2763:     %% ERL-647; we wouldn't see any events on EOF when polling a pipe using
 2764:     %% kqueue(2).
 2765:     case os:type() of
 2766:         {unix, _} ->
 2767:             Command = "erl -noshell -eval "
 2768:                       "'\"DATA\n\" = io:get_line(\"\"),"
 2769:                       "eof = io:get_line(\"\"),"
 2770:                       "halt()' <<< 'DATA'",
 2771:             Ref = make_ref(),
 2772:             Self = self(),
 2773:             Pid = spawn(fun() -> os:cmd(Command), Self ! Ref end),
 2774:             receive
 2775:                 Ref -> ok
 2776:             after 5000 ->
 2777:                 exit(Pid, kill),
 2778:                 ct:fail("Stuck reading from stdin.")
 2779:             end;
 2780:         _ ->
 2781:             {skipped, "Unix-only test"}
 2782:     end.
